here,"},{"lineNumber":142942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんな場所で会うとは思わなかったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought we'd meet in a place like this.\""},{"lineNumber":142943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私も、また会えるとは思っていなかった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I didn't think we'd meet again either.\""},{"lineNumber":142944,"originalJapaneseLine":"きゅっ、と、謙信は胸の辺りで手を握った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin clenched her hand over her chest safe...\""},{"lineNumber":142946,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うむ、謙信は相変わらず可愛いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, Kenshin is as cute as sight.)"},{"lineNumber":142949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、ならば丁度いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, then it's perfect."},{"lineNumber":142950,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様はバボラに向かっている最中だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm currently heading to Baborah."},{"lineNumber":142951,"originalJapaneseLine":"　謙信も来い」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin, come with me.\""},{"lineNumber":142952,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信は眉根を寄せた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin furrowed her brows."},{"lineNumber":142953,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……申し訳ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm sorry."},{"lineNumber":142954,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は同行できない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot accompany you.\""},{"lineNumber":142955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":142956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「討つべき敵がいる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There is an enemy I must defeat.\""},{"lineNumber":142957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物大将軍ルメイの創設した、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The special incineration corps established by the demon general Lumei,"},{"lineNumber":142958,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特別焼却師団」","translatedEnglishLine":"the Special Incineration Corps.\""},{"lineNumber":142959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだそりゃ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's that?\""},{"lineNumber":142960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵陣を包囲し周囲から火で囲み、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They surround enemy lines and encircle them with fire,"},{"lineNumber":142961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中の者を焼き殺す部隊です」","translatedEnglishLine":"burning those inside alive—this is their unit.\""},{"lineNumber":142962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……敵陣ならいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...If it's enemy lines, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":142963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"?\""},{"lineNumber":142964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「彼らの手は敵陣のみならず、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Their hands have reached not only enemy territory,"},{"lineNumber":142965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争に関係のない村にまで及んでいるのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"but also villages unrelated to the war.\""},{"lineNumber":142966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信様のやらねばいけないこととはそれです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is what you must do, Lord Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":142967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特別焼却師団の殲滅……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exterminate the Special Incineration Corps..."},{"lineNumber":142968,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが無理でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"If that is impossible,"},{"lineNumber":142969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せめて村人達を脱出させなければ」","translatedEnglishLine":"at least evacuate the villagers.\""},{"lineNumber":142970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念ですが、脱出の手伝いまでです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately, you can only assist with the evacuation."},{"lineNumber":142971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　数が到底違うので」","translatedEnglishLine":"Their numbers are overwhelmingly greater.\""},{"lineNumber":142972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……分かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Understood.\""},{"lineNumber":142973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく、そういうことですので」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, that is the situation.\""},{"lineNumber":142974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーむ、そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I see.\""},{"lineNumber":142975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺も一緒に行ってやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll go with you.\""},{"lineNumber":142976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":142977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、いいんですか、ランス様？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, is that alright, Lord Rance?"},{"lineNumber":142978,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バボラは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What about Baborah...?\""},{"lineNumber":142979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい、いい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's fine, fine."},{"lineNumber":142980,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はこっちの方が優先だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, this takes priority.\""},{"lineNumber":142981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……残念だが、断らせてもらう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Unfortunately, I'll have to decline.\""},{"lineNumber":142982,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、むう？　何故だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mu, huh? Why?\""},{"lineNumber":142983,"originalJapaneseLine":"「助力は嬉しく思う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I appreciate your help."},{"lineNumber":142984,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、お互い討つべき敵は別。","translatedEnglishLine":"But we each have different enemies to fight."},{"lineNumber":142985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私には助太刀してもらう理由がない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no reason to accept your assistance.\""},{"lineNumber":142986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、固いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, you're stubborn.\""},{"lineNumber":142987,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛しのランス様が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My beloved Lord Rance"},{"lineNumber":142988,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の手助けしてくれるなんてラッキー。","translatedEnglishLine":"helping me out like this is such luck."},{"lineNumber":142989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは是非ともついてきてもらおう」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I'm definitely having you come along.\""},{"lineNumber":142990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう思っておけばいいのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just think of it that way.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、謙信がこっちにいると聞いていたが、
こんな場所で会うとは思わなかったぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought we'd meet in a place like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私も、また会えるとは思っていなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I didn't think we'd meet again either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きゅっ、と、謙信は胸の辺りで手を握った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin clenched her hand over her chest tightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （うむ、謙信は相変わらず可愛いな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hmm, Kenshin is as cute as ever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様にベタ惚れの女の子というのは、
何度見てもいいものだ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: no matter how many times I see it, it's a nice sight.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はバボラに向かっている最中だ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is an enemy I must defeat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物大将軍ルメイの創設した、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The special incineration corps established by the demon general Lumei,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵陣を包囲し周囲から火で囲み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They surround enemy lines and encircle them with fire,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中の者を焼き殺す部隊です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: burning those inside alive—this is their unit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「彼らの手は敵陣のみならず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their hands have reached not only enemy territory,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争に関係のない村にまで及んでいるのです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but also villages unrelated to the war."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謙信様のやらねばいけないこととはそれです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is what you must do, Lord Kenshin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて村人達を脱出させなければ」
「残念ですが、脱出の手伝いまでです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, you can only assist with the evacuation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、そういうことですので」
「あの、いいんですか、ランス様？
今はこっちの方が優先だ」
だが、お互い討つべき敵は別。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we each have different enemies to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私には助太刀してもらう理由がない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no reason to accept your assistance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の手助けしてくれるなんてラッキー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: helping me out like this is such luck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは是非ともついてきてもらおう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I'm definitely having you come along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう思っておけばいいのだ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
